Package ro.uvt.regisb.magpie.utils

Class WeightedMediaFilter

java.lang.Object
ro.uvt.regisb.magpie.utils.WeightedMediaFilter
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class WeightedMediaFilter
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
List of tags and precise BPM selector. Encompass "genre", "feel" and BPM tags for media selection.

  • Method Details

    • addGenre

      public void addGenre​(java.lang.String genre, int count)
      Add or update a "genre" tag. Add or update a "genre" tag and remove tags whose weight are equal to zero.
      Parameters:
      genre - Tag name.
      count - Weight of the tag. Positive for inclusion and negative for exclusion.

    • addFeel

      public void addFeel​(java.lang.String feel, int count)
      Add or update a "feel" tag. Add or update a "feel" tag and remove tags whose weight are equal to zero.
      Parameters:
      feel - Tag name.
      count - Weight of the tag. Positive for inclusion and negative for exclusion.
